sections.heading: to 59A-16A-4 - Repealed.
sections.text: Repeals.— Laws 1998, ch. 115, § 18 repealed 59A-16A-1 to 59A-16A-4 NMSA 1978, amended by Laws 1991, ch. 86, §§ 1-4, relating to Insurance Fraud Reporting Immunity Act, effective July 1, 1998. For provisions of former sections,seethe 1997 NMSA 1978 onNMOneSource.com. For new similar provisions,seeChapter 59A, Article 16C NMSA 1978.
